name: Higher education R&D expenditures, by source of funds: FY 2022
description: Higher education R&D expenditures, by source of funds: FY 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Other includes all other agencies reported. This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in FY 2021. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in FY 2021 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2022 that did not include the question on specific agency funding sources. Total expenditures from institutions reporting less than $1 million in R&D in FY 2022 was $162 million.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey.
